extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites    MATH280 and MATH281 and MATH231.

basic.description: The classical calculus of variations: the Gateaux variation, necessary conditions, transversality, corner conditions, Euler-Lagrange multiplier theorem; applications to Hamiltonian mechanics and the Maximum Principle. Given jointly with MATH 832/3.0.
basic.subject: MATH
basic.title: Variational Methods
